rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: A spacious area with Mediterranean design aesthetics, featuring neutral color palette and natural light

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room, ideal for family meals; features open floor plan and wide entry doors in compliance with wheelchair accessibility.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Fully functional Mediterranean kitchen with modern appliances and an ergonomic layout ensuring ease of movement.

rooms.name: Servants Quarters
rooms.description: Small living space for domestic help, designed to be simple yet comfortable, located near service entrance. Complies with Vastu principles by being positioned at the back or northwest corner.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: A dedicated entertainment area designed for a home theater experience; features soundproofing, comfortable seating and accessible controls, arranged according to Vastu guidelines ensuring proper energy flow.
